de.tuberlin.pserver.crdt.counters

Class AbstractCounter

  • Object
    • AbstractCRDT
      • AbstractCounter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Counter, CRDT
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    GCounter, SimpleCounter

    public abstract class AbstractCounter
extends AbstractCRDT
implements Counter

    This class provides a skeletal implementation of the Counter interface to minimize the effort required to implement this interface in subclasses. The count is initialized at zero.

    Classes extending this class should use the addCount() and removeCount() methods to modify the count.
